posts.post_content:
Sit sodales velit natoque suspendisse ultrices blandit. Ultrices tempor si nibh tristique potenti fames. Dictumst molestie platea etiam tempor aenean quisque ad tempus sociosqu dignissim. Ac augue netus posuere tincidunt aptent enim porttitor. Nec ultrices praesent orci vehicula turpis. Tempus aptent luctus praesent iaculis quam scelerisque habitant.

In tristique sapien semper litora nisi. Sodales cras nisl suscipit nulla suspendisse. Inceptos sollicitudin bibendum in blandit etiam felis lectus. Maximus sem tortor montes nec fermentum lobortis accumsan finibus. Scelerisque ligula vel nunc neque sit quis enim hac mi ac maecenas. Mi hac amet condimentum scelerisque id urna porttitor platea.
posts.post_excerpt: Meet with one our experts to discuss your financial priorities and explore the best loan options for your family.

meta_input.hero_description: Don't let credit concerns stand between you and your dream home. Our credit specialist will review your report and provide  advice on how to improve your score and enhance your buying power.
meta_input.section2_description: Unlock the door to your dream home with confidence. Our credit program is here to review your credit reports, offer  advice, and guide you on the path to improving your score and maximizing your buying power. Don't let credit concerns hold you back – take the first step towards homeownership today!
meta_input.section_last_description: Providing buyers with the knowledge, education and resources to improve scores and reduce payments.
meta_input.gallery_description: In house Credit Expert with over 30 years of experience

item-0.text: Personalized credit concierge with roadmap plan with counseling

meta_input.section3_description: Our experienced mortgage advisors are here to answer your questions, explore your options, and provide personalized guidance tailored to your unique financial situation.

item-2.title: Low Rates, Great Programs & low fees

meta_input.section4_title: From Start to Finish, Making Home Happen
meta_input.section4_description: We believe in clear communication and providing you with all the information you need to make informed decisions about your mortgage.
meta_input.section4_card_1_text: Streamlined and straightforward. Easy online and mobile application built to allow our clients to feel secure and add flexibility.
meta_input.section4_card_2_text: Click the link below for a standard punchlist of documentation needed for Underwriting approval.
meta_input.section4_card_3_text: Fully approved loan and appraisal review of home value. Final Closing Disclosure to be sent 5 to 7 days before closing.
meta_input.section4_card_4_text: Closing Day is a thrilling milestone, marking the culmination of your homebuying journey and the beginning of a new chapter in your dream home.
meta_input.card_description: We love Making Home Happen more affordable. Our Seller funded buydown program will lower your monthly payments for the first 36 months of the loan!  Enjoy lower payments NOW!

posts.post_excerpt: Tonya and her team were so kind and patient with my questions. You can tell that they really care about their clients. The entire process was very easy and went smoothly. I highly recommend Tonya and her team.
